choices.name: ChemotherapyinducednauseaVomiting
choices.choiceText: Chemotherapy induced nausea & Vomiting (CINV)

choices.name: Insomnia
choices.choiceText: Insomnia

choices.name: NeuropathicPain
choices.choiceText: Neuropathic Pain

recordCreates.description: Creates application record from the form in previous element
recordCreates.name: Create_Application_Record
recordCreates.label: Create Application Record

fields.name: Section_2B
fields.fieldText:
Product Documentation


Please upload any relevant product information you may have to support your application.

fields.name: confirmheader
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation


Please review the information you have provided and press NEXT to save your application and proceed to the next step.

fields.name: check_your_email
fields.fieldText:
Check your email


We have sent you a declaration to the email address you provided ({!Email} ). You will find the declaration attached as a PDF fie. This document needs to be scanned and signed by the applicant.

screens.name: More_Goods_Heading
screens.label: Add More Goods to this Application?

fields.name: Add_More_Goods2
fields.fieldText:
More Goods?


Do you wish to add more unapproved goods to this application?

fields.name: Section_1B
fields.fieldText:
Supporting Documents


Your application has been successfully saved. Please note your reference : {!get_ApplicationRecord.Name}.


Please upload your supporting documents.


  • Minimum Of Three TGA-SAS-B Approval Letters.


  • Supporting Evidence Including Certificates Of Attendance Or Completion Of A Continuing Professional Education Course/Activity.


  • Informed Consent Form (Which Will Be Signed By Patients)

validationRule.errorMessage: AHPRA number format is A3N10 e.g. MED0000000001

fields.name: Sites
fields.fieldText: Sites At Which The Unapproved Good Will Be Prescribed (List All Addresses)

fields.name: RiskManagementStrategy
fields.helpText:
How will risks associated with the use of the unapproved good by managed? This should address:


  1. Process of obtaining informed consent from patient.
  2. Monitoring and reporting that will be undertaken (include details of interval and duration of monitoring)
  3. Process of investigating and reporting adverse events

Please append Informed Consent Form (which will be signed by patients).

fields.name: Section_2A
fields.fieldText:
Unapproved Goods


Please tell us the details of the unapproved goods you wish to prescribe.

fields.name: Sponsor
fields.fieldText: Sponsor (Company From Whom You Will Obtain The Unapproved Good)

fields.name: Is_this_Good_approved_for_use_in_other_Jurisdictions
fields.fieldText: Is this Good approved for use in other Jurisdictions

fields.name: tellusaboutindications
fields.fieldText:
Clinical Information


Please tell us the clinical details, proposed indications and other information about the unapproved good.

fields.name: Which_clinical_indications_will_this
fields.fieldText: Which clinical indications will this Good be used for?

fields.name: Seriousness_of_the_medical_condition_s_for_which_the_good_will_be_used
fields.fieldText: Seriousness of the medical condition(s) for which the good will be used

fields.name: clinical_justification
fields.fieldText: Clinical justification for using the unapproved good.

fields.name: Is_there_an_approved_Good_for_the_same_indication
fields.fieldText: Is there an approved Good for the same indication?

fields.name: Have_you_already_or_will_you_attempt_to_use_the_approved_good_prior_to_supplying
fields.fieldText: Have you already or will you attempt to use the approved good prior to supplying the unapproved good?

fields.name: Why_is_the_approved_good
fields.fieldText: Why is the approved good inappropriate or unsuitable for use?

fields.name: Welcome_Text
fields.fieldText:
Welcome


ï»¿Welcome to the application for registration to prescribe medicinal cannabis.



To proceed, please confirm you have the following items ready (they will be necessary to complete the process):

fields.name: Checklist1
fields.fieldText: A Minimum Of Three TGA-SAS-B Approval Letters

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that you have the items ready before proceeding

fields.name: Checklist2
fields.fieldText: Any Supporting Evidence Including Certificates Of Attendance Or Completion Of A Continuing Professional Education Course/Activity

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that you have the items ready before proceeding

fields.name: Checklist3
fields.fieldText: Informed Consent Form To Be Signed By Patients

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that you have the items ready before proceeding

fields.name: Checklist4
fields.fieldText: Product Information For The Goods You Are Planning To Prescribe

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that you have the items ready before proceeding
